g.text: Builds things. Tends to care more about how they're
13 years in WoW emulation. Not much to show for it
except a lot of servers still running the same code.
Currently exploring further. Game dev, platforms,
systems design. The geometry keeps changing.
Management / RPG browser game set in
game built on Roblox. Complex production chains.
STACK : Native HTML / JS · Lapis · MySQL
5inq — systems architect · language engine specialist · code craftsman
"⏳ Je sais déjà comment ça se termine."
